title: Heritage of hops
creator_credit: Phillip Mark-Law, Don Anderson and Tasmanian State Film Unit
brief_description: The charm of the early days of hop growing in Tasmania has been preserved in many hop buildings. Modern hop growing and processing techniques are now highly sophisticated. Hops are used in beer brewing to bitter the beer.
creator_credit_for_label: Phillip Mark-Law, Don Anderson and Tasmanian State Film Unit
description: The charm of the early days of hop growing in Tasmania has been preserved in many hop buildings. Modern hop growing and processing techniques are now highly sophisticated. Hops are used in beer brewing to bitter the beer.
